definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: He's just gone out to buy some CDs.
sentences.chinese: 他剛剛出去買激光唱片了。

sentences.english: Over 70 minutes of music can be accommodated on one CD.
sentences.chinese: 一張激光唱片可以容納70多分鐘的音樂。

sentences.english: Compact discs have brought about a vast improvement in recorded sound quality.
sentences.chinese: 激光唱片極大地提高了錄音的音質。

sentences.english: The CDs are in the drawer.
He has a large collection of CDs.
sentences.chinese: 他收集了很多激光唱片。

sentences.english: You can bring the CD to school .
sentences.chinese: 你可以把激光唱片帶到學校來嗎？

sentences.english: Those CDs are in your backpack.
sentences.chinese: 那些激光唱片在你的揹包裏。

sentences.english: One characteristic of compact discs we all can hear is dead sound.
sentences.chinese: 激光唱片的特點之一就是音質純淨。

sentences.english: I've arranged my CDs in alphabetical order.
sentences.chinese: 我已把我的激光唱片按字母順序排列好了。

sentences.english: You may choose from among these discs.
sentences.chinese: 你可以從這些激光唱片中挑選。

sentences.english: He has a number of compact discs.
He has an abundance of CDs.
sentences.chinese: 他擁有大量的激光唱片。

sentences.english: Every one of their CDs has been a hit.
sentences.chinese: 他們的每一張激光唱片都曾經非常流行。

sentences.english: Do you use video casettes or laser discs?
sentences.chinese: 你們用錄音帶還是用激光唱片？

sentences.english: They sell CDs and things, but it's all cheap stuff.
sentences.chinese: 他們賣激光唱片之類的東西，都是便宜貨。

definition: cassette tape/abbr. for 盒式錄音磁帶|盒式录音磁带/CL:盤|盘[pan2]
compact disc/CD or DVD/CD ROM/CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]
hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]
